text: 10:12-13 Joel 2:32; Aposel 2:21; 9:14; 10:36; 15:9; Rom 3:22; 3:29; Galesia 3:28Godɨn Akɨnafarim ghaze, “Ekiamɨn ziamɨn diaghamin adarasi, a men akurvagham.” Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Godɨn vamɨra iti, a bar en Ekiam. Eghtɨ gumazamizir an deiba, a bar bizir aghuir avɨriba men akurvagham. Judaba ko Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, Godɨn damazimɨn magh gari.
